ComicInfo.Title: Firesword!
ComicInfo.Summary: Firesword!: While the comics creators take part in Tom Fagan's Halloween costume parade, Thor battles first the Absorbing Man and then Loki. Sif persuades Karnilla to assist Thor in his fight with Loki, in return for which she agrees to accompany Karnilla on a quest. Thor summons a storm, and Loki is rendered blind. Stumbling, he falls over the edge of a cliff.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:26:41. [Issue ID 25851]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Thor,Diablo (dog),Sif,Len Wein,Karnilla,Absorbing Man [Crusher Creel],Glynis Wein,Steve Englehart,Loki,Gerard Conway,Hildegarde,Satan (dog),Tom Fagan
